results.name: Triangle read by rows, A156663 * (A001045 * 0^(n-k))
comment: Row sums = A001045 starting with offset 1: (1, 1, 3, 5, 11, 21, 43,...).
As an eigentriangle, row sums = rightmost term of next row.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A156663 * (an infinite lower triangular matrix with A001045 as the main diagonal and the rest zeros).
